title: 自定义NPC在服务器里安装了就进不去服务器了
author: 匿名
txt_content: 如题，自定义NPCmod安装在了服务器里就怎么也进不去服务器了，客户端与服务器的MOD是一样的，这点没有错，玩家在尝试进入服务器时会出现以下情况：Forge Mod Loader has found ID mismatches Complete details are in the log file ID 1525 from Mod customnpcs is missing ID 1526 from Mod customnpcs is missing ID 1527 from Mod customnpcs is missing ID 1528 from Mod customnpcs is missing ID 1529 from Mod customnpcs is missing自定义NPCmod尝试裸装也不行，求解决方法，捣乱的就不要回帖了

replies.author: BFXLQC
replies.txt_content: ID问题 让服务端的config和客户端的config相同
